item.title: Solved :) :) :)
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

if you want only owner then the

playerRights == 3

if you want all staff

playerRights >= 1

if you want all players

playerRights >= 0

if you want only admins and owner

playerRights >= 2

item.title: Solved :) :) :)
item.dc:creator: @kc_titan_911 kc titan 911
item.description:
@kc_titan_911 wrote:

Hi for some reason every time i set my commands ,only owners can use them here is what one of my commands look like without the colors tho lol thats just what it put it as when i put in the code so then i tried this code also look at the second code

First try

[code=blitzbasic]if(playerCommand.equals(“staffzone”) && c.playerRights >= 1) {

           c.getPA() .movePlayer(3281, 2768, 0);          
           c.sendMessage("You have teleported to the Staff zone all that is here cant be traded or demoted");

}[/code]

Second try still not working and if i do c.playerRights==1){ owners cant even tele there some1 plz help

if(playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 1) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getPA() .movePlayer(3281, 2768, 0); c.sendMessage("You have teleported to the Staff zone all that is here cant be traded or demoted"); }
